titles.title: And Shall I Pray Thee Change Thy Will (word fi

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And shall I pray Thee change Thy will my Father Until it be according unto mine But no Lord no That never shall be rather I pray Thee blend My human will with Thine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I pray Thee hush The hurrying eager longing I pray Thee soothe The pangs of keen desire See in my quiet places Wishes thronging Forbid them Lord Purge though it be with fire{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And work in me To will and do Thy pleasure Let all within me Peaceful reconciled Tarry content my Well-Beloved's leisure At last - At last Even as a weaned child{/lang-eng}
